Description_lang: Wise Mari protects himself in multiple layers of $@spellname106062, reducing damage taken by $s2% for each layer of protection. Whenever a layer of $@spellname106062 is removed it inflicts $396874s1 Frost damage to all enemies and reduces movement speed by $396874s2% for $396874d.Any enemy that comes into contact with the protective $@spellname106062 will suffer $106079s2 Frost damage and be knocked away.
AuraDescription_lang: Damage taken reduced by $s2%.Inflicts $396874s1 Frost damage to all enemies when a layer of the protective $@spellname106062 is removed.
